      Constructors in shadows with parameters of type Camera 
      Constructor and Description
      ShadowBox(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f lightViewMatrix, Camera camera)
      Creates a new shadow box and calculates some initial values relating to the camera's view frustum, namely the width and height of the near plane and (possibly adjusted) far plane.
      ShadowMapMasterRenderer(Camera camera)
      Creates instances of the important objects needed for rendering the scene to the shadow map.
